summary: Dental hospital website inspired by https://oraacaresmile.com/ with professional design, online appointment booking, service showcase, testimonials, and contact integration. Content in US English for international audience.
architectural_notes: Website designed for dental hospital/clinic targeting patient trust and easy appointment booking
Responsive design for mobile and desktop users
Integration points: Google Maps API, WhatsApp Business API, Google Reviews widget
Service cards use accordion/toggle interaction pattern for progressive disclosure of detailed information
All content now in US English instead of Hindi/Hinglish for broader international accessibility
Design inspiration from https://oraacaresmile.com/ for visual style and user experience
Services should link to a dedicated detail page within the same site, not opening in new tabs
Website needs high-quality dental equipment and patient consultation imagery to build trust and showcase facility
Doctors section should highlight credentials and specializations of Dr. Anas Jadla, Dr. Farhan Bangra, and Dr. Jainul Aabedin
Animations should be added to key UI elements (hero section, service cards, testimonials, etc.) using CSS transitions/animations or React animation libraries for smooth user experience
known_issues: Services section not visible or rendering on deployed website despite being implemented
Services page crashes with white screen when opened
Backend canister (63qpd-iqaaa-aaaah-qrmga-cai) enters stopped state preventing appointment booking functionality from working
Admin panel displays 'Unauthorized: Only admins can view all appointments' error preventing appointment viewing even after authentication
Appointment form service type dropdown and date picker have visibility issues due to background interference, making options difficult to read and select
Installation/installing error occurs during appointment booking or other operations

existing_features.title: Create a hero section with headline 'Ek Behtar Muskurahat ki Shuruat Yahan Se Hoti Hai.', subheadline 'Advanced technology aur dard-mukt (painless) treatment ke saath aapka apna dental clinic.', and a prominent 'Abhi Appointment Book Karein' call-to-action button that navigates to the appointment booking interface

Create a services section displaying 6 dental services: Check-up & Cleaning (Rozana ki danton ki dekhbhal), Root Canal Treatment (Bina dard ke danton ka ilaaj), Dental Implants (Khoye hue danton ko wapas lagayein), Teeth Whitening (Chamakti muskurahat ke liye), Braces & Aligners (Tedhe-medhe danton ka sahi alignment), and Pediatric Dentistry (Bachon ke danton ka khaas ilaaj)

Create a 'Why Choose Us' section highlighting four key features: Expert Doctors (10+ saalon ka tajurba), Modern Tech (Latest machines aur sterilization), Emergency Care (24/7 dental emergency support), and Affordable Price (Sahi daam par behtareen ilaaj)
Create a patient testimonials section that displays patient reviews with a Google ratings integration widget, and include space for before/after photos

Create a contact section with embedded Google Maps for clinic location, display clinic hours (Somvaar se Shanivaar, 9 AM - 8 PM), and provide phone number and WhatsApp chat link for easy communication
Implement an online appointment booking system that allows patients to schedule appointments, capturing patient name, contact information, preferred date and time, and service type

Apply a professional, modern, and trust-building visual design theme throughout the website that conveys cleanliness, medical professionalism, and patient comfort, using a color palette that evokes healthcare trust (such as calming teals, clean whites, and professional grays), clear typography suitable for medical content, and generous spacing that emphasizes clarity and approachability

Convert the existing ServicesSection component to use an accordion/expandable card pattern where each service card can be clicked to expand and reveal detailed information below the service title and description

Add detailed content for 'Dental Check-up & Cleaning' service expansion including: Procedure description 'Digital X-ray aur danton ki gehrai se safai (Scaling)', Benefit 'Cavity aur masoodon ki bimari se bachav', Time duration 'Sirf 30-45 minute', and a CTA button 'Abhi check-up schedule karein' that navigates to the booking page

Add detailed content for 'Root Canal Treatment (RCT)' service expansion including: Procedure 'Sade hue hisse ko saaf karke danton ko bachana', Special feature 'Single-sitting painless procedure (bin dard ke)', Benefit 'Asli daant ko nikaalne se bachata hai', and CTA button 'Dard se chutkara paayein' that navigates to the booking page

Add detailed content for 'Dental Implants' service expansion including: Procedure 'Titanium post ke saath naye majboot daant lagana', Longevity 'Ye zindagi bhar saath dete hain', Benefit 'Khane-peene aur bolne mein asli danton jaisa mehsoos hota hai', and CTA button 'Apni muskurahat wapas paayein' that navigates to the booking page

Add detailed content for 'Teeth Whitening' service expansion including: Procedure 'Advanced laser technology se peelepan ko hatana', Result 'Pehle hi session mein 3-4 shades safed daant', Benefit 'Shaadi ya party ke liye turant chamak', and an appropriate CTA button that navigates to the booking page

Ensure the remaining services (Braces & Aligners and Pediatric Dentistry) also have expandable sections with similar structured content including procedure, benefits, and CTAs that navigate to the booking page, maintaining consistency with the other four services

Update the hospital name from 'Dr. Priya Dental Clinic' to 'Satya Dental Care' across all frontend components including Header, Footer, HeroSection, and any other locations where the clinic name appears
Update the contact phone number to 6352174912 in Header, ContactSection, Footer, and any other components displaying phone numbers
Update the WhatsApp contact number to 6352174912 in ContactSection and any other components with WhatsApp integration, ensuring the WhatsApp link uses the correct international format
Update the email address to anasjadala@gmail.com in ContactSection, Footer, and any other components displaying contact email

Convert all Hindi and Hinglish content in HeroSection to US English including the headline 'Ek Behtar Muskurahat ki Shuruat Yahan Se Hoti Hai' and subheadline 'Advanced technology aur dard-mukt (painless) treatment ke saath aapka apna dental clinic', replacing them with professional US English equivalents that convey the same message about quality dental care

Convert all Hindi and Hinglish service descriptions in ServicesSection to US English for all 6 services (Check-up & Cleaning, Root Canal Treatment, Dental Implants, Teeth Whitening, Braces & Aligners, Pediatric Dentistry) including titles, descriptions, procedure details, benefits, and CTA button labels
Convert all Hindi and Hinglish content in WhyChooseUsSection to US English for all four features (Expert Doctors, Modern Tech, Emergency Care, Affordable Price) including titles and descriptions
Convert all Hindi content in TestimonialsSection patient reviews to US English while maintaining the authenticity and sentiment of the testimonials
Convert all Hindi and Hinglish content in ContactSection to US English including the clinic hours label 'Somvaar se Shanivaar, 9 AM - 8 PM' and any other text labels
Convert all Hindi and Hinglish content in AppointmentForm to US English including form labels, placeholders, validation messages, and success confirmation text
Convert all Hindi and Hinglish content in BookingPage to US English including page headings and any instructional text
Update Footer component to display 'Satya Dental Care' as the clinic name, phone number 6352174912, and email anasjadala@gmail.com in US English with appropriate labels

Remove the copyright text '© 2026 Satya Dental Care. Built using Caffeine.ai' from the Footer component, keeping only the copyright symbol and year with the clinic name (e.g., '© 2026 Satya Dental Care')

Update HeroSection to match the Oraa Care Smile layout style with a full-width background hero banner, centered text overlay with headline and subheadline, and prominent CTA buttons positioned centrally below the text
Redesign ServicesSection to display services in a clean grid layout with icon cards similar to Oraa Care Smile, where each service shows an icon, title, and brief description before expansion
Update WhyChooseUsSection to use a horizontal card layout with icons and text similar to Oraa Care Smile, emphasizing visual consistency and professional presentation
Redesign TestimonialsSection with a carousel or slider layout for patient reviews, including star ratings and patient photos, matching the testimonial presentation style of Oraa Care Smile
Update ContactSection to display contact information and Google Maps in a side-by-side layout similar to Oraa Care Smile, with contact details on one side and map on the other

Update the global color scheme and typography to match Oraa Care Smile's design system, using their color palette (healthcare blues, clean whites, professional accents) and modern sans-serif typography
Add a smooth scroll behavior to navigation links and CTA buttons throughout the site, enabling seamless scrolling to different sections when clicked

Update Header navigation to include inline section links (Home, Services, About, Testimonials, Contact) that scroll to corresponding sections on the homepage, matching Oraa Care Smile's navigation pattern
Add hover effects and animations to service cards, CTA buttons, and interactive elements throughout the site to match the polished, modern interaction style of Oraa Care Smile

Create a new ServiceDetailPage component at frontend/src/pages/ServiceDetailPage.tsx that displays comprehensive information about a single dental service including service name, detailed description, procedure information, benefits, duration, pricing information (if available), and a call-to-action button to book an appointment
Add a new route /services/:serviceId to the TanStack Router configuration in frontend/src/App.tsx that renders the ServiceDetailPage component and accepts a dynamic serviceId parameter

Update the ServicesSection component in frontend/src/components/ServicesSection.tsx to make each service card link to its dedicated detail page using client-side navigation (Link component from TanStack Router), ensuring navigation occurs within the same tab without opening new browser tabs

Create a service data structure or service content configuration in the ServiceDetailPage that maps service IDs to their full detailed content, including comprehensive procedure descriptions, benefits lists, duration information, and any special features for all 6 dental services
Add a back navigation button or breadcrumb navigation to the ServiceDetailPage that allows users to return to the homepage services section using same-tab navigation

Create a new DoctorsSection component at frontend/src/components/DoctorsSection.tsx that displays three dental professionals: Dr. Anas Jadla, Dr. Farhan Bangra, and Dr. Jainul Aabedin, with professional profile cards showing their names, titles/specializations, and profile images
Add the DoctorsSection component to the HomePage component in frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx, positioned between WhyChooseUsSection and TestimonialsSection
Update HeroSection component to include a background image showing dental equipment and a patient-doctor interaction scene as the hero banner background
Add dental equipment and patient care imagery to the ServicesSection component, displaying relevant contextual photos within or alongside the service cards
Add a photo gallery or image showcase to the WhyChooseUsSection component showing dental machinery, clinic interior with modern equipment, and patient-doctor interactions
Reference all generated images as static assets from frontend/public/assets/generated directory in the respective components, ensuring proper image loading and optimization
Add fade-in animations to the HeroSection component for the headline, subheadline, and CTA buttons with staggered delays, using CSS transitions or Framer Motion
Add scroll-triggered fade-in and slide-up animations to the ServicesSection service cards, making them animate into view as the user scrolls down
Add hover scale and shadow animations to all service cards in ServicesSection, increasing size and shadow depth on hover
Add scroll-triggered animations to the WhyChooseUsSection feature cards, making them fade in and slide in from the left as they enter the viewport
Add scroll-triggered fade-in animations to the photo gallery in WhyChooseUsSection, making images appear progressively as the user scrolls
Add scroll-triggered fade-in and slide-up animations to the DoctorsSection profile cards
Add hover scale and glow animations to doctor profile cards in DoctorsSection, increasing card size slightly and adding a subtle glow effect on hover
Enhance the TestimonialsSection carousel with smooth slide transitions, fade effects, and auto-play functionality with pause on hover
Add scroll-triggered fade-in animation to the ContactSection information cards and map
Add pulse animation to all CTA buttons (Book Appointment, Contact buttons) throughout the website to draw user attention
Add smooth page transition animation when navigating to ServiceDetailPage and BookingPage
Add loading state animations to the AppointmentForm submit button, showing a spinner or loading indicator during form submission
Implement intersection observer or scroll animation library (like Framer Motion, AOS, or React Spring) to handle scroll-triggered animations efficiently across all sections

Create a new standalone ServicesPage component at frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx that displays all 6 dental services (Check-up & Cleaning, Root Canal Treatment, Dental Implants, Teeth Whitening, Braces & Aligners, Pediatric Dentistry) in a dedicated page layout with comprehensive service information including icons, images, descriptions, procedures, benefits, and duration for each service
Add a new route /services to the TanStack Router configuration in frontend/src/App.tsx that renders the ServicesPage component, making it accessible as a separate page from the homepage
Update the Header component navigation links to include a 'Services' link that navigates to the new /services page route instead of scrolling to the services section on the homepage

Update the HomePage component to either remove the ServicesSection component or convert it to a brief services preview that links to the full /services page, ensuring the homepage does not duplicate the complete services content
Add scroll-triggered fade-in and slide-up animations to the ServicesPage service cards using the useScrollAnimation hook, consistent with animation patterns used throughout the site
Ensure all service cards on the ServicesPage link to their respective ServiceDetailPage routes (/services/:serviceId) for users who want to view individual service details

Audit the current ServicesPage component at frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx to identify all dental services currently displayed and compare against a comprehensive list of dental services typically offered by a full-service dental clinic

Expand the ServicesPage component to include additional dental services beyond the existing 6 services (Check-up & Cleaning, Root Canal Treatment, Dental Implants, Teeth Whitening, Braces & Aligners, Pediatric Dentistry), adding services such as: Gum Disease Treatment, Tooth Extraction, Dental Crowns & Bridges, Dentures (Full & Partial), Oral Surgery, Emergency Dental Care, Cosmetic Dentistry, Dental Veneers, Preventive Care, and TMJ Treatment

Create corresponding service detail content for each newly added service in the ServiceDetailPage component's service data structure, including comprehensive procedure descriptions, benefits lists, duration information, and special features for each service

Update the AppointmentForm component's service type dropdown to include all newly added dental services as selectable options, ensuring the backend appointment booking system can handle all service types
Add scroll-triggered fade-in and slide-up animations to all newly added service cards on ServicesPage using the useScrollAnimation hook, maintaining consistency with existing service card animations
Investigate and fix why the ServicesSection component is not rendering on the HomePage despite being implemented in the codebase
Verify that the HomePage component in frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx properly imports and renders the ServicesSection component between HeroSection and WhyChooseUsSection

Debug and fix the white screen crash that occurs when navigating to the /services route by inspecting the ServicesPage component for runtime errors, null reference errors, missing imports, or incorrect data structures

Verify that all service data in ServicesPage.tsx includes required fields (id, title, description, duration, icon) and that no service entries have undefined or null values that could cause rendering failures
Ensure the ServicesPage component properly handles the useScrollAnimation hook and that animation setup does not cause component mounting failures or render blocking
Add any missing dental services to the ServicesPage that are currently absent, ensuring comprehensive coverage of all dental treatments mentioned in the appointment booking form (16 services total)
Wrap critical sections of the ServicesPage component rendering logic in error boundaries or try-catch blocks to prevent full page crashes and provide graceful error handling

Replace the hero section background image in HeroSection component (frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx) with a new background image that provides better contrast with the white text overlay, ensuring the headline and subheadline are clearly readable

Update the HeroSection component in frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx to display two separate hero images side by side or in a rotating carousel format: one featuring dental clinic imagery (patient-doctor interaction, dental equipment) and one with promotional text overlay displaying messages like 'Best Smile With Us' and '20% Off'
Reference the two new hero images as static assets from the frontend/public/assets/generated directory in the HeroSection component, ensuring proper image loading, optimization, and responsive sizing

Update the HeroSection component in frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx to wrap both hero images (clinic imagery and promotional '20% Off' banner) in separate bordered container boxes with visible spacing between them
Add a black background to the promotional image container (the one displaying '20% Off' text) in the HeroSection component to make it stand out and ensure the promotional content is highlighted

Remove the background image from the promotional '20% Off' container in the HeroSection component (frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx) and replace it with a sky blue solid color or gradient background, with lighter blue at the top transitioning to a slightly darker blue at the bottom

Redesign the AppointmentForm component in frontend/src/components/AppointmentForm.tsx with modern, attractive styling and enhanced animations to improve visual appeal and user experience, replacing the current form design with a more polished, professional appearance
Add entrance animations to the AppointmentForm when the BookingPage loads, including fade-in and slide-up effects for the form container to create a smooth initial presentation

Update the AppointmentForm component in frontend/src/components/AppointmentForm.tsx to replace the current rectangular/box-shaped form container with a rounded/circular shape design by applying increased border-radius values (e.g., rounded-3xl or custom border-radius: 2rem-3rem) to the main form container element

Enhance the visual appearance of the AppointmentForm component with improved styling including refined color schemes, better spacing, enhanced typography, subtle shadows or gradients, and polished form field designs to create a more attractive and modern aesthetic

Create a new AdminPage component at frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx that displays a comprehensive list of all appointments from the backend, showing patient name, contact information, preferred date and time, service type, and appointment status in a table or card layout
Add a new route /admin to the TanStack Router configuration in frontend/src/App.tsx that renders the AdminPage component

Create a React Query hook useAllAppointments() in frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts that fetches all appointments from the backend using the getAllAppointments() method, with proper error handling and loading states

Add a navigation link to the admin page in the Header component (frontend/src/components/Header.tsx) labeled 'Admin' that navigates to the /admin route, making it easily accessible from the main navigation menu
Add scroll-triggered fade-in animations to the AdminPage appointment list using the useScrollAnimation hook, consistent with animation patterns used throughout the site
Add filtering and sorting capabilities to the AdminPage, allowing appointments to be filtered by service type, date range, or patient name, and sorted by date (ascending/descending)

Update the AdminPage component in frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx to properly handle authentication state and display appointments when the user has admin privileges, removing the 'only admin can see all appointments' blocking message
Update the useAllAppointments() hook in frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts to properly handle the authenticated actor instance and error states when fetching appointments
Add proper Internet Identity authentication check in AdminPage component to ensure users are logged in before attempting to fetch appointments, displaying a login prompt if not authenticated

Update the AdminPage component in frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx to handle the successful appointments data response and display appointments in the table without showing the 'Unauthorized' error message

Verify that the useAllAppointments() hook in frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts properly passes the authenticated actor to the backend getAllAppointments() call and handles error responses appropriately

Create a new login form component at frontend/src/components/AdminLoginForm.tsx that captures username and password inputs with validation, styled consistently with the existing AppointmentForm design patterns

Update the AdminPage component in frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx to display the AdminLoginForm when the user is not authenticated, and only show the appointments table after successful login verification

Implement frontend authentication logic in the AdminLoginForm component that validates username 'ANAS' and password 'Anas@2020' exactly (case-sensitive), displaying appropriate error messages for invalid credentials
Add a logout button to the AdminPage header or navigation area that clears the admin authentication state and returns the user to the login form
Store the admin authentication state in sessionStorage or localStorage after successful login, and verify this state on AdminPage mount to maintain login across page refreshes

Update the AppointmentForm component in frontend/src/components/AppointmentForm.tsx to apply a white background color to the service type dropdown menu when opened, ensuring all service options are clearly visible and easy to select against a solid white background instead of showing background content interference

Update the AppointmentForm component in frontend/src/components/AppointmentForm.tsx to apply a white background color to the date picker calendar popup when opened, ensuring all dates are clearly visible and easy to select against a solid white background instead of showing background content interference
Debug and fix the 'actor not installed' error that occurs when users attempt to book appointments through the AppointmentForm component in frontend/src/components/AppointmentForm.tsx

Update the AppointmentForm component in frontend/src/components/AppointmentForm.tsx to add proper error handling and loading states that wait for actor initialization before enabling the form submit button
Add defensive null checks and error boundaries in the appointment booking mutation logic in frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts to handle cases where the actor is undefined or not yet initialized
Debug and resolve the installation error that occurs when users attempt to book appointments or perform other operations in the application

Add comprehensive error logging and user-friendly error messages in the AppointmentForm component (frontend/src/components/AppointmentForm.tsx) to capture and display installation-related errors with actionable feedback

Add retry logic and graceful degradation in the appointment booking mutation hook (frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts) to handle transient installation or network errors, with exponential backoff and maximum retry attempts

Verify that the Internet Identity authentication and actor initialization in useActor hook (frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts) properly handles edge cases where authentication tokens expire or become invalid during form submission, preventing installation errors

new_feature_requests.summary: Hero section with headline, subheadline, CTA button, and patient/dentist images
Services section displaying 6 dental services with descriptions
Why Choose Us section highlighting expertise, technology, emergency care, and pricing
Patient testimonials section with reviews, before/after photos, and Google ratings widget
Contact section with Google Maps integration, clinic hours, phone number, and WhatsApp chat link
Online appointment booking system
Deploy the dental hospital website to production on the Internet Computer network, making it publicly accessible with a live URL
Make service cards interactive with click-to-expand accordion functionality showing procedure, benefits, time, and CTA for each service
Update contact number and WhatsApp to 6352174912, email to anasjadala@gmail.com
Convert all website content from Hindi/Hinglish to US English
Remove footer text showing '2026 Satya Dental Care built with using Carreine.ai'
Redesign website to match the style, layout, and features of https://oraacaresmile.com/
Create a separate dedicated services detail page that opens within the same website (not in a new tab)
Add multiple dental machine photos and patient-with-doctor photos throughout the website
Create a doctors section featuring 3 doctors: Dr. Anas Jadla, Dr. Farhan Bangra, and Dr. Jainul Aabedin
Add animations throughout the website to enhance visual appeal and user experience
Add all dental services to the services section (ensure comprehensive service coverage)
Check and fix any CSS or styling issues that might be causing the ServicesSection to be hidden or have zero height/width
Verify that all service card images referenced in ServicesSection are accessible from the frontend/public/assets/generated directory and render correctly
Check browser console for JavaScript errors or React rendering errors that might prevent ServicesSection from mounting
Fix white screen crash when opening services page
Change hero section background image because text color is blending with the image colors
Add two separate hero images to hero section: one with imagery and one with promotional text (e.g., 'best smile with us' and '20% off')
Update hero section to place both images in separate boxes with space between them, and add black background to the promotional '20% off' image for highlighting
Remove background image from the promotional '20% off' container and replace with a sky blue gradient (lighter at top, darker at bottom)
Make testimonials/reviews auto-slide continuously
Redesign appointment form with super animations and attractive modern styling to replace current design

Update the TestimonialsSection component in frontend/src/components/TestimonialsSection.tsx to enable continuous auto-play functionality for the testimonials carousel, making reviews automatically slide/transition in a loop without requiring user interaction
Change appointment form shape from rectangular box to rounded/circular shape and improve visual appearance
Add an admin page/feature where all appointments can be viewed
Add a backend query method getAllAppointments() in backend/main.mo that returns all appointments stored in the system, ensuring the frontend can fetch the complete appointments list
Deploy the current version of the dental hospital website to the Internet Computer production network, making it publicly accessible with a stable canister URL that users can visit
Verify that the backend canister stability issue (canister entering stopped state) is resolved before production deployment, ensuring the appointment booking system remains operational
Ensure all generated images in frontend/public/assets/generated directory are included in the production build and accessible via the deployed canister URL
Fix admin panel display issue showing 'only admin can see all appointments' error when accessing the admin page
Verify the backend getAllAppointments() method in backend/main.mo correctly implements role-based access control, ensuring it returns appointment data when called by authenticated admin users
Fix admin panel authentication error showing 'Unauthorized: Only admins can view all appointments' message

Update the backend getAllAppointments() method in backend/main.mo to remove or modify the admin-only authorization check that is currently blocking all users from viewing appointments, allowing authenticated users to access the appointments list
Add username/password authentication to admin panel with username 'ANAS' and password 'Anas@2020'
Fix appointment form service type dropdown menu background to white for better visibility and make date picker background white as well
Fix 'actor not installed' error occurring when booking appointments

Verify that the useActor hook in frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts correctly initializes the backend actor with proper authentication and authorization token before any appointment mutations are executed
Verify that the backend canister (63qpd-iqaaa-aaaah-qrmga-cai) is running and accessible, and that the createAppointment method in backend/main.mo is properly deployed and callable from the frontend

Verify that the backend canister (63qpd-iqaaa-aaaah-qrmga-cai) dependencies and Motoko module imports are correctly configured and that no missing or broken dependencies are causing installation failures
